thread.title: Why Uber is replacing rental cars, cabs on our family vacations
thread.title_full: Why Uber is replacing rental cars, cabs on our family vacations

author: Plain Dealer guest writer
title: Why Uber is replacing rental cars, cabs on our family vacations
text: I don't know about you, but Uber has changed our family travels and rather drastically. Rarely do we consider renting a car anymore, and we take cabs only when easy or necessary. Our sudden keenness for Uber springs from cost savings, certainly, but that's not all. It's the liberating convenience of the thing.
